document.full_text: the government has given bhp billiton the second new permit to drill in the gulf of mexico since the macondo oil spill, the bureau of ocean energy management said on saturday.
document.title: u.s. issues second post-spill drill permit in gulf
lines_and_colors: the government has given bhp billiton the second new permit to drill in the gulf of mexico since the macondo oil spill, the bureau of ocean energy management said on saturday.
